text:
Concept Reply AG | Embedded Software Engineer | Munich, Germany | Full-Time, Onsite, Visa support

We are a team of engineers doing projects for automotive companies. Nowadays we are busy developing and supporting software for carsharing modules (e.g. DriveNow), it is mostly in C++11, embedded Linux and technologies around that. Development is agile, our team is international with friendly vibes going on. We are looking for middle to senior level engineers. So if you are interested in doing nice embedded projects and have good knowledge of Real Time SW (OS and application layer), Embedded and RT Linux (OS and application layer), languages (C++, C, Assembler, Python), communication buses and protocols (UART, SPI, I2C, CAN), please don't hesitate to contact me.

On the plus side would be also: - Knowledge in the area of HW design and development (PCB, HW debug) - Embedded profiling and debugging (PMU, JTAG etc), specific Linux distributions (Android, Yocto) - Understanding of test code coverage - Reading proficiency in German.

My e-mail: d.nikitenkov@reply.de

See our linkedin page here: https://www.linkedin.com/company/concept-reply/
